vernac_cmds: Coercion dec2bool P (d: dec P) := if d then true else false.
Definition Dec (X: Prop) (d: dec X) : dec X := d.
Hint Extern 4 => match goal with | [ |- dec ((fun _ => _) _) ] => cbn end : typeclass_instances.
Tactic Notation "decide" constr(p) "as" simple_intropattern(i) := destruct (Dec p) as i.
Notation "'eq_dec' X" := (forall x y : X, dec (x=y)) (at level 70).
Structure eqType := EqType { eqType_X :> Type; eqType_dec : eq_dec eqType_X }.
Canonical Structure eqType_CS X (A: eq_dec X) := EqType X.
Instance list_eq_dec X : eq_dec X -> eq_dec (list X).
Fixpoint count (X: Type) `{eq_dec X} (A: list X) (x: X) {struct A} : nat := match A with | nil => O | cons y A' => if Dec (x=y) then S(count A' x) else count A' x end.
Class finTypeC (type:eqType) : Type := FinTypeC { enum: list type; enum_ok: forall x: type, count enum x = 1 }.
Structure finType : Type := FinType { type:> eqType; class: finTypeC type }.
Canonical Structure finType_CS (X : Type) {p : eq_dec X} {class : finTypeC (EqType X)} : finType := FinType (EqType X).
Lemma countIn (X:eqType) (x:X) A: count A x > 0 -> x el A.
Lemma elem_spec (X: finType) (x:X) : x el (elem X).
Lemma countSplit (X: eqType) (A B: list X) (x: X) : count A x + count B x = count (A ++ B) x.
Fixpoint pos (X : eqType) (x : X) (A : list X) := match A with | [] => None | a :: A => if Dec (x = a) then Some 0 else match pos x A with Some n => Some (S n) | None => None end end.
Definition pos_el' (X : eqType) (x : X) (A : list X) (H : x el A) : {n | pos x A = Some n}.
Lemma pos_length (X : eqType) (x : X) A n : pos x A = Some n -> n < |A|.
revert n; induction A; cbn; intros.
destruct (pos x A) eqn:E; inv H.
Lemma pos_nth (X : eqType) (x : X) A n : pos x A = Some n -> nth_error A n = Some x.
revert n; induction A; cbn; intros.
destruct (pos x A) eqn:E; inv H.
Definition pos_el (X : eqType) (x : X) (A : list X) (H : x el A) := proj1_sig (pos_el' H).
Definition index (X : finType) (x : X) := pos_el (elem_spec x).
Lemma map_app_inv X Y (f : X -> Y) x y z : map f x = y ++ z -> exists x' x'', x = x' ++ x'' /\ map f x' = y /\ map f x'' = z.
revert x; induction y; cbn; intros.
Lemma pos_inj (X : eqType) (x y : X) (A : list X) n : pos x A = Some n -> pos y A = Some n -> x = y.
revert n; induction A; cbn; intros.
decide (x = a); decide (y = a); subst; try congruence.
destruct (pos x A), (pos y A); inv H; inv H0.
Inductive tape : Type := | niltape : tape | leftof : sig -> list sig -> tape | rightof : sig -> list sig -> tape | midtape : list sig -> sig -> list sig -> tape.
decide equality; decide (e=e0); decide (l=l0); auto; decide (l= l1); decide (l0=l2); auto.
Definition tapeToList (t : tape) : list sig := match t with | niltape => [] | leftof s r => s :: r | rightof s l => List.rev (s :: l) | midtape l c r => (List.rev l) ++ [c] ++ r end.
Definition current := fun (t : tape) => match t with | midtape _ c _ => Some c | _ => None end.
Definition left := fun (t : tape) => match t with | niltape => [] | leftof _ _ => [] | rightof s l => s :: l | midtape l _ _ => l end.
Definition right := fun (t : tape) => match t with | niltape => [] | leftof s r => s :: r | rightof _ _ => [] | midtape _ _ r => r end.

Definition mk_tape ls c rs := match c with | Some c => midtape ls c rs | None => match ls with | List.nil => match rs with | List.nil => niltape | r :: rs => leftof r rs end | l :: ls => rightof l ls end end.
Inductive move : Type := L : move | R : move | N : move.
Record sTM : Type := { states : finType; trans : states * (option sig) -> states * ((option sig) * move); start: states; halt : states -> bool }.

Definition tape_move_right := fun (t : tape) => match t with niltape => niltape | rightof _ _ =>t | leftof a rs => midtape [ ] a rs | midtape ls a rs => match rs with [] => rightof a ls | a0 :: rs0 => midtape (a::ls) a0 rs0 end end.

Definition tape_move_left := fun (t : tape) => match t with niltape => niltape | leftof _ _ => t | rightof a ls => midtape ls a [ ] | midtape ls a rs => match ls with [] => leftof a rs | a0 :: ls0 => midtape ls0 a0 (a::rs) end end.
Definition tape_move := fun (t : tape) (m : move) => match m with R => tape_move_right t | L => tape_move_left t | N => t end.
Definition tape_write := fun (t : tape) (s : option sig) => match s with None => t | Some s0 => midtape (left t) s0 (right t) end.
Definition tape_move_mono := fun (t : tape) (mv : option sig * move) => tape_move (tape_write t (fst mv)) (snd mv).
Record mconfig (states:finType) : Type := mk_mconfig { cstate : states; ctape : tape }.
decide (cstate0 = cstate1); decide (ctape0 = ctape1); try (right; intros H; now inversion H).
Definition step := fun (M:sTM) (c:mconfig (states M)) => let (news,action) := trans (cstate c, current (ctape c)) in mk_mconfig news (tape_move_mono (ctape c) action).
Definition initc := fun (M : sTM) tape => mk_mconfig (@start M) tape.
Definition loop (A:Type) := fix l n (f:A -> A) (p : A -> bool) a {struct n}:= if p a then Some a else match n with O => None | S m => l m f p (f a) end.
Definition loopM := fun (M :sTM) (i : nat) cin => loop i (@step M) (fun c => halt (cstate c)) cin.
Definition TMterminates (M: sTM) (start: mconfig (states M)) := exists i outc, loopM i start = Some outc.
Lemma loop_step_not A f p (a : A) i out: loop i f p (f a) = out -> (p a = false) -> (loop (S i) f p a = out).
destruct i; intros H HF; cbn in *; rewrite HF; destruct (p (f a)); assumption.
Inductive reach (M: sTM) : mconfig (states M) -> mconfig (states M) -> Prop := |reachI c : reach c c |reachS c d: reach (step c) d -> (halt (cstate c) = false) -> reach c d.
Definition Halt' (M: sTM) (start: mconfig (states M)) := exists (f: mconfig (states M)), halt (cstate f)=true /\ reach start f.
Lemma TM_terminates_Halt (M:sTM) (start: mconfig (states M)) : TMterminates start <-> Halt' start.
induction i; intros start H; cbn in *.
Definition Halt (S: {sig:finType & sTM sig & tape sig}) := Halt' (initc (projT2 (sigT_of_sigT2 S)) (projT3 S)).
Definition Reach (S: (sigT (fun (sig:finType) => (sigT (fun (M:sTM sig) => prod (mconfig sig (states M)) (mconfig sig (states M))))))) := let (c1,c2) := (projT2 (projT2 S)) in reach c1 c2.

command: revert n; induction A; cbn; intros.
destruct (pos x A) eqn:E; inv H.
revert n; induction A; cbn; intros.
destruct (pos x A) eqn:E; inv H.
revert x; induction y; cbn; intros.
revert n; induction A; cbn; intros.
decide (x = a); decide (y = a); subst; try congruence.
destruct (pos x A), (pos y A); inv H; inv H0.
decide equality; decide (e=e0); decide (l=l0); auto; decide (l= l1); decide (l0=l2); auto.
decide (cstate0 = cstate1); decide (ctape0 = ctape1); try (right; intros H; now inversion H).
destruct i; intros H HF; cbn in *; rewrite HF; destruct (p (f a)); assumption.
induction i; intros start H; cbn in *.
